mapper.update:
update t_card_user
wechat_id = #{wechatId,jdbcType=CHAR},
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR},
identity_number = #{identityNumber,jdbcType=CHAR},
passport_id = #{passportId,jdbcType=CHAR},
industry = #{industry,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
work_unit = #{workUnit,jdbcType=CHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_card_user set wechat_id = #{wechatId,jdbcType=CHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, identity_number = #{identityNumber,jdbcType=CHAR}, passport_id = #{passportId,jdbcType=CHAR}, industry = #{industry,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, work_unit = #{workUnit,jdbcType=CHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into t_card_user (user_id, wechat_id, `name`, identity_number, passport_id, industry, work_unit, phone, gender, create_time, update_time, dr) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{wechatId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{identityNumber,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{passportId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{industry,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{workUnit,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT} )
mapper.select:
select
from t_card_user left join t_card_authentication on t_card_user.user_id = t_card_authentication.user_id where wechat_id = #{wechatId,jdbcType=CHAR} and t_card_user.dr=1 and t_card_authentication.dr=1 and t_card_authentication.status=#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}
